Synopsis
Based on true events. Kate Barker (Shelley Winters) raised their four children in an authoritarian manner, but was too lenient with their misdeeds. They venerated, but especially feared. When the boys grew older, Kate left her weak husband and went with them to seek their fortunes. Thus began Barker for a life devoted to crime and crime that caused them to be persecuted relentlessly for justice. Ma Barker was one of the most unusual figures in the era of American gangsterism.
